title: Pomegranate
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. 2 orange & gold warp. beige, brown, gold & metallic silver weft. Stapled to 8.5x11\" card with 99.1.1185.13.  diff. fabric than Pomegranate, possibly created on a Pomegranate warp. plain weave, slight plaid effect. (orange, yellow, gold, beige, brown, silver  metallic)
